instructions: From any home screen, tap Messaging . Tap Menu > Settings > MORE > Emergency alerts . Enable or disable the following options: [RECEIVE ALERTS] Presidential alert (set to always on and cannot be turned off) Imminent extreme alert (ON/OFF) Imminent severe alert (ON/OFF) AMBER alerts (ON/OFF) [ADDITIONAL LANGUAGES] Spanish (ON/OFF) [SOUND AND VIBRATION] Alert sound (ON/OFF) Alert vibration (ON/OFF) Presidential are always on and cannot be turned off.

From any home screen, tap Email . Tap Menu > Settings . Under ' ACCOUNTS & SYNC,' Tap the email account. Scroll down to NOTIFICATION settings. Select or clear the New emails slider. Tap Notification sound to update. Select or clear the Sent email sound slider.
From any home screen, swipe left to locate and tap Settings . Select Sound & notification tab or scroll to DEVICE > tap Sound > Ringtone . Tap to select desired ringtone, then OK .
From any home screen, swipe left to locate and tap Contacts . Tap desired contact. Tap the edit icon. Tap More > Ringtone . Tap to select desired ringtone. Tap OK . Tap SAVE .
